title: Head Girls Soccer Coach (no teaching assignment)
description: This Head Girls Soccer coaching assignment is for the 2026-2027 school year with no expectation of a teaching assignment.WCSD coaches are required to meet all UHSAA certification requirementspriorto starting assignment and are required to maintain certifications during duration of employment.If any additional questions, applicants can contact the Athletic Director, Marcus Matua, at marcus.matua@washk12.org.A stipend will be provided for this assignment.
